entries.message:
Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Stockholm location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2023-04-11 02:00:00 UTC  (04:00 local time)
End Time: 2023-04-11 04:00:00 UTC  (06:00 local time)

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to reduce impact to customer infrastructure. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact, however, network reachability to Stockholm instances may be affected for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform this work. While it’s important to be aware of start and end times of the maintenance window, due to our redundant network architecture, our engineers expect that you may see little to no impact at all while the work is performed.

Event Type: Provisioning platform upgrade

In an effort to continuously enhance the customer experience, we are performing routine maintenance on my.vultr.com and api.vultr.com during the following scheduled maintenance window: 

Start Time: 2023-03-27 20:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2023-03-27 22:00:00 UTC

This maintenance affects Vultr provisioning and management systems only. During this maintenance window deploying or managing instances via API or my.vultr.com may be unavailable for brief periods of time, but the normal operation of your Vultr instances and infrastructure will not be affected. Provisioning or management attempts during this time may timeout or fail, if so, please wait a few minutes and try again.

The 2 hour window is a precautionary measure and the work is expected to be very brief.  Please feel free to open a support ticket with any questions or concerns.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Singapore location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2023-03-28 16:30:00 UTC
End Time: 2023-03-28 20:30:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Singapore instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
